author: Trail-Gazette staff
title: Bobcats fall to Clear Creek 38-12
text: Bobcats fall to Clear Creek 38-12 Trail-Gazette staff Posted: 10/17/2015 02:51:33 PM MDT Senior wide receiver Evan Ginter picks up some yards during last week's game against Front Range Christian. (Debbie Holmes / Trail-Gazette) The Estes Park Bobcats suffered a 38-12 defeat at the hands of the Clear Creek Golddiggers Friday night, Oct. 16 in Evergreen. The Golddiggers led 26-0 at halftime. Bobcat senior running back Sam Addison scored a touchdown in the thirdquarter, and senior wide receiver added a TD in the fourth quarter. First-half action was highlighted by a reception and 50-yard gain by senior tight end Logan Kittler. Read more in Wednesday's Trail-Gazette. Advertisement
